name: European Social Insurance Platform AISBL
legal: association internationale sans but lucratif de droit belge
goal: Representing the interests of European national statutory social insurance organisations at EU level. Consulting with the EU institutions on all social policy, pension and health issues.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Youth
